Docs.param: The URL to a SPARQL Protocol server.
Docs.summary: Creates a new SPARQL data source ready to connect to the SPARQL server at the given URL.
Docs.remarks: A new HTTP connection is created on each call to a method in this class.

Docs.summary: This class is used to access data remotely via the SPARQL Protocol.

remarks.para: The SparqlHttpSource accesses remote data using the SPARQL Protocol over HTTP.

SPARQL has some serious limitations regarding blank nodes. Critically, a blank node returned by a SPARQL query cannot be referenced in future queries. As a result, blank nodes returned by calls to this source cannot be used in future select calls to this source.
